mapper.select: SELECT PNUM, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE, REQ, LATLNG, WDATE FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(PNUM,0) AS PNUM, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, IFNULL(COUNTS.CURMONEY,0) AS CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE, REQ, LATLNG, WDATE FROM SHCROWD LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) PNUM, PSEQ, SUM(MONEY) CURMONEY FROM SHFUND GROUP BY PSEQ) COUNTS ON COUNTS.PSEQ=SHCROWD.SEQ WHERE SEQ =#{seq}) A

SELECT rnn,pnum,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ,LATLNG,WDATE FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 as rnn,IFNULL(pnum,0) as pnum,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, IFNULL(COUNTS.CURMONEY,0) AS CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ,LATLNG,WDATE FROM SHCROWD left join (SELECT COUNT(*) PNUM,PSEQ,SUM(MONEY) CURMONEY FROM SHFUND GROUP BY pseq) COUNTS ON COUNTS.PSEQ=SHCROWD.seq,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0)R WHERE REQ = 0 ORDER BY SEQ DESC) A

SELECT rnn,pnum,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ,LATLNG,WDATE FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 as rnn,IFNULL(pnum,0) as pnum,SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, ID, GOALMONEY, LIKENUM, IFNULL(COUNTS.CURMONEY,0) AS CURMONEY, TAG, SDATE, EDATE, CATEGORY, ADDRESS, TYPE,REQ,LATLNG,WDATE FROM SHCROWD left join (SELECT COUNT(*) PNUM,PSEQ,SUM(MONEY) CURMONEY FROM SHFUND GROUP BY pseq) COUNTS ON COUNTS.PSEQ=SHCROWD.seq,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0)R WHERE ID = #{id} ORDER BY SEQ DESC) A
